req1: The system shall support transfers up to $10,000 per transaction.
req2: The system shall support unlimited transaction amounts for verified business users. ⚠️ (conflicts with #3)
label: contradiction
reason: REQ_0004 imposes a universal maximum transfer limit of $10,000 per transaction, while REQ_0005 allows unlimited transaction amounts for verified business users, creating a direct contradiction for that user class.

req1: The system shall automatically log users out after 5 minutes of inactivity.
req2: The system shall maintain user sessions for up to 15 minutes for convenience. ⚠️ (conflicts with #5)
label: contradiction
reason: REQ_0006 requires automatic logout after 5 minutes of inactivity, while REQ_0007 allows sessions to remain active for up to 15 minutes, creating a direct contradiction in session timeout duration.
